The `setOn` and `setOff` methods in the `DirectLights` class manage the activation and deactivation of individual lights within a Panda3D scene. These functions are essential for dynamically controlling scene illumination by adding or removing light nodes to/from the render tree, enabling precise lighting adjustments.

def setOn(self, directLight):
        """
        Turn on the given directLight
        """
        render.setLight(directLight)

    def setOff(self, directLight):
        """
        Turn off the given directLight
        """
        render.clearLight(directLight)
